title: PR #42: Add user authentication feature
comments: Overall good implementation. The authentication flow is well-structured and follows security best practices. Minor suggestions below.
suggestions: Add input validation for email format in the registration endpoint
Consider adding rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks
Add unit tests for edge cases in password validation
Document the JWT token expiration policy

title: Security Review: Authentication Middleware
comments: Security scan completed successfully. No critical vulnerabilities detected. The implementation uses secure password hashing (bcrypt) and proper JWT handling.

title: Code Quality Review
comments: Code quality is good. Follows project conventions and maintains consistency. Some minor refactoring opportunities identified.
suggestions: Add type hints for better code documentation
Consider using dependency injection for better testability
